items.title: Bulk deals : Vikasa India EIF I Fund buys 75,000 shares in Pelatro Limited
items.description: Nirmal Kumar Deepchand Gangwal sold 17,719 shares in Vadilal Enterprises for an average price of Rs 4,093.07.

items.title: Noel Tata’s Bid for Tata Sons Chairman Blocked by Ratan Tata’s 2022 Rule
items.description: Noel Tata faces hurdles in becoming Chairman of Tata Sons due to a rule established by Ratan Tata in 2022, preventing one individual from chairing both Tata Trusts and Tata Sons. This follows a long history of obstacles, including past discussions that led to his brother-in-law Cyrus Mistry taking the role instead. Learn more about the implications of this decision on the Tata Group's leadership.

items.title: Nasdaq closes higher ahead of a heavy week of earnings
items.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 259.96 points, or 0.61%, to 42,114.40, the S&P 500 lost 1.74 points, or 0.03%, to 5,808.12 and the Nasdaq Composite gained 103.12 points, or 0.56%, to 18,518.61.

items.title: More than 300 smallcaps lose between 10-32% as broader indices underperform
items.description: The BSE Large-cap Index, BSE Mid-cap Index and BSE Small-cap indices fell 3.2 percent, 5.2 percent and 7.3 percent, respectively.

items.title: OTM spread option strategy for long weekends: Shubham Agarwal
items.description: Spread is a strategy that involves Buying and Selling of Options of the same stock. The Strike prices are usually different with the same Option type (Call or Put).

items.title: Market posts longest weekly losing streak since August 2023; all sectors in the red
items.description: On the sectoral front, Nifty Media, Metal, Realty shed 7 percent each, Nifty Oil & gas index fell more than 6 percent, Nifty PSU Bank index declined nearly 6 percent and Nifty Auto index slipped more than 5 percent.

items.title: ICICI Bank reports strong Q2, signals margins to stabilise from here on
items.description: Despite margin contraction in Q2, the management expressed confidence that the worst of the margin pressure is now behind them.
